1.title: Winter, I'm Going Out to Talk
1.plot: Rediscover the charm of Iwate in winter, such as handicrafts made in heavy snow areas, hot spring inn that enjoy snow, valleys that show the fascination of Fukayama Valley. What is the appeal of a tentious trip unique to winter.

2.title: A Trip to Sanriku
2.plot: In this episode, we travel from Kamaishi through Rikuzentakata. Both cities lie along the southern coasts of Iwate Prefecture, where redevelopment has been in progress since being hit by the Great East Japan earthquake in 2011. Here, one is welcomed by spring's warmth and its refreshing sea breeze. Heartwarming encounters with locals and regional flavours await. (Broadcast in Japan in April 2015).

imdb.plot outline: Discover everything that Iwate, in the northern region of Japan, has to offer. From the stunning natural scenery to the unique culture to the delicious cuisine add to the unparalleled charms of the area. During the snowcapped winters, you can't miss the hot spring inns and the magnificent deep mountain valleys that make Iwate the perfect winter getaway. Get ready to be amazed by the beauty of northern Japan. "Tabiaruki from Iwate" is a Japanese travel show.
